short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows school district administrative assistants to copy data from the Parent Forms online registration system andâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows school district administrative assistants to copy data from the Parent Forms online registration system and paste it into any web-based student information system. It is designed to be force deployed by school district IT staff.
